dataList.name: ผู้ท้าชิงคู่แข่ง
วงจรชาร์จตระกูลชื่อ(史)
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
Turn End: At 2+ [Charge], gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: วงจรชาร์จทำงาน
dataList.desc: Deal +5% damage for every 6 [Burst] on target (Max 10%)

dataList.name: เกินพิกัด
dataList.desc: Turn End: at 3+ [Charge], gain 3 [DefenseDown] and 1 [AttackDmgUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: เกินพิกัดหนักหน่วง
dataList.desc: Turn End: at 5+ [Charge], gain 4 [DefenseDown] and 3 [AttackDmgUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: เป้าหมายทดลอง - เติบโต
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain [DefenseUp] equal to (number of times this unit was hit by the enemies' Skill Attacks / 2) (max 10)

Lose this effect when Staggered for the first time; then, at the ในเทิร์นถัดไป Start, gain 10 [DefenseDown]

dataList.name: เป้าหมายทดลอง - งอกเงย
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit isn't at max HP, heal 80% of the missing HP
- With every healing, halve the healing effect of this Passive by half (halves down to 10% minimum; applies only when this unit heals more than 1 HP)
- Does not activate when Staggered

After this unit is Staggered for the first time, or when the healing effect is reduced to its minimum, gain 3 [Vulnerable] at every Turn Start

dataList.name: เป้าหมายทดลอง - บานสะพรั่ง
dataList.desc:
When this unit takes damage that brings its HP down to 0, and maintain this unit's HP at 1 until the ในเทิร์นถัดไป; deal +50% damage (once per Encounter)

Does not activate when Staggered

dataList.name: ผู้ใช้ผ้ายันต์
dataList.desc:
Whenever this unit สร้างs [OminousTalisman] against an enemy, lose 10 SP

Against targets with [OminousTalisman], deal +(0 - SP on self)% damage (max 30%, min 0%)

dataList.name: โชคร้ายแพร่กระจาย
dataList.desc:
On death, มอบ 10 [OminousTalisman] against a random enemy without [OminousTalisman]
- If all enemies already have [OminousTalisman], then reduce all enemies' [OminousTalisman] by 1 instead

dataList.name: พลังงานชั่วร้าย
dataList.desc: When สร้างing [OminousTalisman] on an enemy, if the target already has [OminousTalisman], consume 1~2 [OminousTalisman] on the target and สร้าง the same value as [DefenseDown] Stacks to the target this turn and ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: ผู้ใช้ผ้ายันต์มือฉมัง
dataList.desc:
Whenever this unit สร้างs [OminousTalisman] against an enemy, lose 10 SP

Against targets with [OminousTalisman], deal +(10 - SP on self)% damage (max 50%, min 0%)

dataList.name: ทักษะก่อกวนวิญญาณ
dataList.desc: Turn Start: at 50% or less HP, sacrifice a random Wicked Deathrite Monk to heal (10% of this unit's HP + 50% of the sacrificed unit's HP) HP, heal 25 SP, and recover from Stagger (once per turn)

dataList.name: พลังงานชั่วร้าย
dataList.desc: When สร้างing [OminousTalisman] on an enemy, if the target already has [OminousTalisman], consume up to 3 [OminousTalisman] on the target and สร้าง the same value as [DefenseDown] Stacks to the target this turn and ในเทิร์นถัดไป
